inputs.name: slide
inputs.text: Indicates it the component should always be opened or only on hover / focus.

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.text: The placeholder displayed within the component, it will be translated.

inputs.name: minPatternLength
inputs.text: The minimum length of the pattern for a search to occur.

inputs.name: maxResults
inputs.text: The maximum number of results that can be displayed.

inputs.name: items
inputs.text: The list of possible hits. The search pattern will be match with the translation of its label property.
